column1: #Text=Looking for someone who has experience / knowledge into developing and optimizing Android applications using Android SDK and Kotlin programming language.Must have experience / knowledge of Kotlin...Solid experience / understanding of OO design fundamentalsBe able to write elegant, readable and well-documented codeProven experience delivering and publishing Android applicationsExperience / knowledge in working with remote data via REST and JSONExperience / knowledge with third party libraries and APIsSolid understanding of the full mobile development life cycleAMPnext focuses on Big Data, Recruiting, Staffing Firms, and Digital Marketing.
#Text=Their company has offices in San Francisco and London.

#Text=They have a small team that's between 11-50 employees.You can view their website at https://ampnext.com Looking for someone who has experience / knowledge into developing and optimizing Android applications using Android SDK and Kotlin programming language Must have experience / knowledge of Kotlin Solid experience / understanding of OO design fundamentals Be able to write elegant, readable and well-documented code Proven experience delivering and publishing Android applications Experience / knowledge in working with remote data via REST and JSON Experience / knowledge with third party libraries and APIs Solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle
